# Paletteo

> Generate, test and preview different colors on UI elements. A beautiful and minimalistic color previewer and generator. Take the color values you get from Paletteo to use in your own code or projects!

Important notes:

    - Paletteo is licensed under Apache 2.0 | Attribution & credit is compulsory
    - Hosted using Vercel.

    Tech Stack:
        - Next.js
        - TailwindCSS & shadcn/ui
        - Framer Motion
        - Lucide Icons
